FuncDef: This command configures the match criteria for this IP filter entry.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the protocol ID or protocol name accepted in DHB. Values-protocol-number - [0 to 255]D.

Specifies the protocol numbers accepted in DHB for IPv6 filter entries. Values-protocol-number - [1 to 42 | 45 to 49 | 52 to 59 | 61 to 255]D[0x0 to 0x2A, 0x2D to 0x31, 0x34 to 0x3B, 0x3D to 0xFF]H [0b0 to 0b101010, 0b101101 to 0b110001, 0b110100 to 0b111011, 0b111101 to 0b11111111]B.
